Description.LocalizedString:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 10 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Increases the range of The Shape's lunge attack while in Evil Within I by 50%.

    • "The note is signed: D."

A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Decreases Terror Radius in Evil Within II by 25%.
  • Increases Terror Radius in Evil Within III by 25%.

A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Unlimited duration of Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.

A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I reveals that Survivor's aura for 3 seconds.

A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 30 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 20 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

A glossy page ripped from the '65 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 25%.

A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favorites.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 20%.

A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 30%.

A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • You become obsessed with one Survivor.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking your Obsession by 40%.

A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 200%.
  • Decreases movement speed by 9% while Evil Within III is active.

    • "Here lies our beloved daughter."

A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 40 seconds.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 100%.

A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 11%.

A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 5 seconds.

A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 2 seconds.

A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • Evil Within I reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 32 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER I.
  • For each Hit score event, score 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 200% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

A very cheap piece of jewelry made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Increases movement speed while stalking by 10%.

A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.
  • Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within.
  • Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 150%.

A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • Evil Within II reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 16 meter range.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past TIER II.
  • For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 150% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.
